original_text: Jacob heard that there was food in Egypt. So he said to his sons, ‘There is no food here, so why are you just sitting there?
korean_text: 그 때에 야곱이 애굽에 곡식이 있음을 보고 아들들에게 이르되 너희는 어찌하여 서로 바라보고만 있느냐

sentences.original_text: that there was food in Egypt
So he said to his sons
so why are you just sitting there
sentences.korean_translation: 그런데 왜 너희는 그저 그곳에 앉아 있느냐
